name: (ASMR) Vin Diesel DMing a Game of D&D Just For You
name_original: (ASMR) Vin Diesel DMing a Game of D&D Just For You
description: What would it be like to have actor Vin Diesel gently and encouragingly DM a game of Dungeons & Dragons for you? Thanks to a new Twine game, you don't have to guess, and the result is joyful.
